member_organisations: 19 regional chambers of commerce in Finland.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives: Company law, securities market regulation, corporate governance, gender quotas, collective redress, consumer protection, IPR, digitalisation, taxation.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert group on technical aspects of corporate governance processes #E03545#Turunen, Antti#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3545#Member#B#Industry, SMEs
membership: Finland Chamber of Commerce is a member of Eurochambres. Eurochambres is a co-operation body and network of European Chambers of Commerce and Industry.
goals__remit:
Finland Chamber of Commerce promotes entrepreneurship and a favourable business environment in Finland and coordinates the operations of the nineteen independent regional Chambers of Commerce in Finland. The 19 Finnish Chambers of Commerce have approximately 20,000 member companies. 
Finland Chamber of Commerce ensures self-regulation in business; offers services related to, for example, dispute resolution, goods inspection and property valuation, and awards Medals of Merit.
